read-terms: Please read these terms of service, carefully before using our app operated by us.
terms-condition: When planning a trip, having access to a user-friendly platform for booking travel tickets and hotels is essential. Our platform offers a streamlined experience, allowing users to browse and book flights, train tickets, and hotel accommodations with ease. Unlike generic booking services, we provide a comprehensive selection of travel options tailored to your preferences, ensuring a smooth and convenient booking process. With advanced filters and sorting options, finding the perfect flight or hotel room that suits your budget and needs has never been easier. Over time, we have refined our platform to enhance user experience, incorporating customer feedback to continually improve our services. Whether you're booking a quick getaway or planning a detailed vacation, our platform is designed to make the process as seamless and enjoyable as possible.
read-privacy: Please read these privacy policy, carefully before using our app operated by us.
privacy-policy:
We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and share your personal information when you use our app.


Information Collection:
We collect personal information such as your name, email address, phone number, and payment details when you register or make bookings for travel tickets and accommodations.
We also collect usage data and interactions with the app to improve your experience and provide better services.

Use of Information:
We use your personal information to provide booking services, manage your account, and communicate with you about your bookings and travel-related information.
We use usage data to analyze and improve our services and to offer personalized content.


Information Sharing:
We may share your personal information with service providers and travel partners to facilitate booking processes and deliver the requested services.
We do not share your personal information with third parties for marketing purposes without your consent.


Data Security:
We take appropriate security measures to protect your personal data from unauthorized access, alteration, or unlawful disclosure.

User Rights:
You have the right to access, correct, or request the deletion of your personal data.
You can contact us at any time to exercise your rights or if you have any questions about the privacy policy.

Changes to the Privacy Policy:
We may update this privacy policy from time to time, and you will be notified of any significant changes through the app or via email.
